name: Kart Blast
description:
Kart Blast is a 2-Player Game where you and friend try to shoot each other down in rocket powered vehicles.  Collect coins to  speed up your Kart in Kart mode or take to the skies in Rocket mode in aerial dogfight. 

Player 1: Controls :

Speedup :W Key

Brake: S Key

Turn : A and D Keys

Shoot: Right Shift

Player 2: Controls :

Speedup :I Key

Brake: K Key

Turn : J and L Keys

Shoot: Left Shift
